Title: Expands the eligibility and increases the number of awards for the New York state young farmers loan forgiveness incentive program
Summary: Expands the eligibility and increases the number of awards for the New York state young farmers loan forgiveness incentive program to undergraduate and graduate degrees; increases the number of such awards from ten to twenty; increases the amount of such award from fifty to sixty thousand dollars upon the end of a six year, rather than five year, period.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to expanding the eligibility and increasing the number of awards for the New York state young farmers loan forgiveness incentive program
